clauses.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.
clauses.clause_text: Log Files: We gather certain information automatically and store it in log files

case.text: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

clauses.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
clauses.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.
clauses.clause_text:
Mobile Application: We may collect information such as registration and activation information from our mobile application(s) associated with our service(s) and your device(s). 
  • Device Data: We may collect various types of data and event information from your device(s) by using cameras, microphones, GPS, or other monitoring sensors.

case.text: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text:
• In General: When you use our website(s), service(s), and your device(s) you may be asked to provide personal information such as:
    • Name and/or business name
    • Home address and/or business address
    • Home, business, and/or mobile telephone number
    • Email address
    • Credit, debit, or other payment account number and related information
    • Date of birth or other identifying personal characteristics
    • Social Security Number
    • Emergency contact list information about others
    • Personal identification code
    • Product Specific: Certain device(s) or service(s) may collect additional information such as:
      • Audio, video, and still-image recordings from your monitoring device(s)
      • Geolocation and GPS information including physical location of your device(s) by using satellite, cell phone tower, or Wi-Fi signals
      • Motion detection, accelerometer activity, and climate conditions surrounding your device(s)
      • Monitoring event information such as arming and disarming your device(s)
      • Internet protocol (IP) addresses, internet service provider (ISP), date/time stamp, and/or other event data which is automatically collected and stored in log files

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Local Stored Objects: We may store information about your browsing activities through locally stored objects by using technologies such as “Flash cookies” and HTML5 (“LSOs”). LSOs tack your actions and store information about your preferences and can be used by third party partners to deliver interest-based advertisements.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: ADT will retain this personal information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: ADT reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate your access to all or part of this site, with or without notice, without liability to you, any other user, or any third party.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.clause_text: We use the information collected from third party sources to determine the suitability of extending credit and for marketing purposes.

Use of this Site shall be governed by all applicable Federal laws of the U.S.
and the laws of the State of Florida, without giving effect to its conflict of laws provisions.

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: We may transfer your information to a third party in the event of any reorganization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, transfer or other disposition of all or any portion of our business, assets or stock, including in connection with any bankruptcy or similar proceedings.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection
clauses.description: This case means that user data is not anywhere in the world, but somewhere where it is more likely to be obtained and used by government and/or possible data analysts.
clauses.clause_text: Cross-Border Transfer: We may transfer, store, and/or access your information electronically or in hard copy in the United States or Canada.

case.text: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: • Legal Authorities: We may also disclose your information for legal reasons including to comply with a subpoena or court order or similar legal process, to cooperate with law enforcement, or when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: You agree to review the Terms of Use periodically for changes, modifications, additions, or deletions. Your continued use of the site after such notice has been given constitutes acceptance of such changes, modifications, additions, or deletions.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
